content:
Our project is using doc-gen4. After updating lean from 4.7.0 to 4.9.0-rc1, building document step is broken, and we don't understand why this error happens (in mathlib seems to be ok).

The error message is here.

Some builds logged failures:
- DocGen4.Process.Analyze
- UnicodeBasic
error: build failed

(full log is https://github.com/iehality/lean4-logic/actions/runs/9422756455/job/25959714229)

I'm looking for the cause, but the number of repositories using doc-gen is a few and not sure. It may be cause the CI configuration is not good, so I'll post the URL of PR that I'm fixing.

https://github.com/iehality/lean4-logic/pull/58
Interesting, somehow doc-gen succeeded bulding in its own CI but doesn't in this case.
This is a mysterious bug with v4.9.0-rc1 (lean4#4375, Zulip). UnicodeBasic currently has a fix but it hasn't been tested on all platforms.
Please check your lake manifest to see if the UnicodeBasic version is at ef8b0ae5d48e7d5f5d538bf8d66f6cdc7daba296.
I'm busy upgrading doc-gen right now there is a bit more to fix.
@SnO2WMaN I think it should be fine on doc-gen master right now, I'm running a build on mathlib to verify.

I Updated, and currently building. If passed, this problem is solved.

https://github.com/iehality/lean4-logic/actions/runs/9423404283/job/25961706526
Please thumbs up lean4#4375 to increase its priority! Who knows where that bug could pop up next!
SnO2WMaN has marked this topic as resolved.
